original_text: You took things from your friends when you lent money to them. You had no reason to do that. You even took away the only clothes that poor people were wearing. 22: When people lent money to others, they took something that belonged to the other person. It was to make sure that the person paid the money back to them. You took things from your friends when you lent money to them.
korean_text: 까닭 없이 형제를 볼모로 잡으며 헐벗은 자의 의복을 벗기며
